description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The all-German Synod of the Evangelical Church, in Berlin; the destruction of the old Anhalter railway station; international riding tournament; the West German President welcomes the President of Pakistan; Dr Adenauer visits Paris; NATO winter manoeuvres; an exhibition of educational methods; filming in the Ruhr; lost property offices; a new ice-breaker tested on the Konigsee.
